oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mvsuggest

Class MVSConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mvsuggest.MVSConfig
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalMVSConfig

    public class MVSConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the MVSService configuration. An instance of this class can be stored and loaded to/from a job configuration.
    Author:
    hsaucedo

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MVSConfig.ResponseSpatialContent
      The type of spatial content returned by MVSuggest
      static class  MVSConfig.ServiceInterface
      The type of MVSuggest interface

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CONF_MATCH_COUNTRY
      Job configuration: a country name used as a context for searches
      static java.lang.String CONF_MATCH_LAYERS
      Job configuration: a comma separated list of layers used by MVSuggest to perform searches
      static java.lang.String CONF_MAX_QUERY_RECORDS
      Job configuration: an integer number defining the maximum number of records sent to MVSuggest by each request.
      static java.lang.String CONF_PROVIDE_TEMPLATES
      Job configuration: boolean value that specified whether or not the MVSuggest implementation should keep the templates content in memory.
      static java.lang.String CONF_RESPONCE_SPATIAL_CONTENT
      Job configuration: the type of spatial content returned by MVSuggest.
      static java.lang.String CONF_SERVCE_LOCATION
      Job configuration: the MVSuggest location.
      static java.lang.String CONF_SERVICE_INTERFACE
      Job configuration: the type of MVSuggest interface.

    • Field Detail

      • CONF_MATCH_COUNTRY

        public static final java.lang.String CONF_MATCH_COUNTRY
        Job configuration: a country name used as a context for searches
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONF_MATCH_LAYERS

        public static final java.lang.String CONF_MATCH_LAYERS
        Job configuration: a comma separated list of layers used by MVSuggest to perform searches
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONF_MAX_QUERY_RECORDS

        public static final java.lang.String CONF_MAX_QUERY_RECORDS
        Job configuration: an integer number defining the maximum number of records sent to MVSuggest by each request.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONF_PROVIDE_TEMPLATES

        public static final java.lang.String CONF_PROVIDE_TEMPLATES
        Job configuration: boolean value that specified whether or not the MVSuggest implementation should keep the templates content in memory. If false, calls to MVSService.getTemplate(String) will always return null.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONF_RESPONCE_SPATIAL_CONTENT

        public static final java.lang.String CONF_RESPONCE_SPATIAL_CONTENT
        Job configuration: the type of spatial content returned by MVSuggest. Supported types are defined in MVSConfig.ResponseSpatialContent
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONF_SERVCE_LOCATION

        public static final java.lang.String CONF_SERVCE_LOCATION
        Job configuration: the MVSuggest location. Depending on the MVSuggest interface it may be a path or a URL
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONF_SERVICE_INTERFACE

        public static final java.lang.String CONF_SERVICE_INTERFACE
        Job configuration: the type of MVSuggest interface. Supported types are defined in MVSConfig.ServiceInterface
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • MVSConfig

        public MVSConfig()

    • Method Detail

      • getMatchCountry

        public java.lang.String getMatchCountry()
        Gets a country name used as context when performing a search
        Returns:
        a country name

      • getMatchLayers

        public java.lang.String[] getMatchLayers()
        Gets the layer names used to narrow MVS searches
        Returns:
        an array of layer names

      • getMaxQueryRecords

        public int getMaxQueryRecords()
        Gets the maximum number of records contained in a request to MVSuggest. The default value is 1
        Returns:
        maxQueryRecords the maximum number of query records per request

      • getResponseSpatialContentType

        public MVSConfig.ResponseSpatialContent getResponseSpatialContentType()
        Gets the type of spatial content returned by MVSuggest when a match is found. It can return the whole geometry of the matched feature, a centroid or nothing.
        Returns:
        the features spatial content type contained in a response

      • getServiceInterfaceType

        public MVSConfig.ServiceInterface getServiceInterfaceType()
        Gets the MVSuggest interface type
        Returns:
        the MVSuggest interface type

      • getServiceLocation

        public java.lang.String getServiceLocation()
        Gets the MVS service location.
        Returns:
        the MVS service location. When MVSuggest interface is local it is a path. When the interface is web it is a URL.

      • isProvideTemplates

        public boolean isProvideTemplates()
        Tells whether the templates should be kept in memory so they can be retrieved by calling MVSService.getTemplate(String)
        Returns:
        true if templates are provided by MVSService

      • load

        public void load(Configuration conf)
        Loads the MVSuggest configuration from the job configuration
        Parameters:
        conf - a job configuration

      • setMatchCountry

        public void setMatchCountry(java.lang.String matchCountry)
        Sets a country name used as context when performing a search
        Parameters:
        matchCountry - a country name

      • setMatchLayers

        public void setMatchLayers(java.lang.String[] matchLayers)
        Sets the layer names used to narrow MVS searches. If null is set, all the layers indexed by MVSuggest will be used.
        Parameters:
        matchLayers - an array of layer names

      • setMaxQueryRecords

        public void setMaxQueryRecords(int maxQueryRecords)
        Sets maximum number of records contained in a request to MVSuggest
        Parameters:
        maxQueryRecords - the maximum number of query records per request

      • setProvideTemplates

        public void setProvideTemplates(boolean provideTemplates)
        Sets whether the templates should be kept in memory so they can be retrieved by calling MVSService.getTemplate(String)
        Parameters:
        provideTemplates - true if templates are provided by MVSService

      • setResponseSpatialContentType

        public void setResponseSpatialContentType(MVSConfig.ResponseSpatialContent responseSpatialContentType)
        Sets the type of spatial content returned by MVSuggest when a match is found. It can return the whole geometry of the matched feature, a centroid or nothing.
        Parameters:
        responseSpatialContentType - the features spatial content type contained in a response

      • setServiceInterfaceType

        public void setServiceInterfaceType(MVSConfig.ServiceInterface serviceInterfaceType)
        Sets the MVSuggest interface type
        Parameters:
        serviceInterfaceType - the MVSuggest interface type

      • setServiceLocation

        public void setServiceLocation(java.lang.String serviceLocation)
        Sets the MVS service location
        Parameters:
        serviceLocation - the MVS service location. When MVSuggest interface is local it is a path. When the interface is web it is a URL.

      • store

        public void store(Configuration conf)
        Saves the MVSuggest to the job configuration
        Parameters:
        conf - a job configuration
